description:
Flowchart illustrating the impact of high coke circulation rate (고가동율) on furnace conditions and slagging (노화불안정):Coke 고가동율 leads to:
  • 입경 저하
  • 강도 저하
These factors lead to:
  • 고로 Gas 류 불안정
  • 용착대 통기 저항 증가
  • 노심 Coke 입도저하
These factors further lead to:
  • 풍압 ↑
  • 하부온도 ↑
  • 풍압변동폭 ↑
  • 출선작업 불안정
  • 노저온도 ↑
All of these factors contribute to 노화불안정 (Slagging/Instability).
full_html:
Flowchart illustrating the impact of high coke circulation rate (고가동율) on furnace conditions and slagging (노화불안정):

Coke 고가동율 leads to:

  • 강도 저하

These factors lead to:

  • 고로 Gas 류 불안정
  • 용착대 통기 저항 증가
  • 노심 Coke 입도저하

These factors further lead to:

  • 풍압 ↑
  • 하부온도 ↑
  • 풍압변동폭 ↑
  • 출선작업 불안정
  • 노저온도 ↑

All of these factors contribute to 노화불안정 (Slagging/Instability).

description: 도식은 풍구 선단 보정 RAR (RAR.RT) 개념을 설명합니다. 현재 장입기준 RAR (485kg/t-p)는 현재 노정장입 C.R (300) + 현재 취입 PCR (185)로 구성됩니다. 현재 풍구선단에서의 RAR (503kg/t-p)는 풍구선단 C.R (310) + 3시간 30분전 취입 PCR (190) + 보정인자 증감 (3, Input +5, Output -2)로 구성됩니다.입력 (Input)은 Coke Ratio와 PCR로 구성됩니다. Coke Ratio는 현재 노정장입 300kg/t-p 및 풍구선단 C.R 310kg/t-p를 포함합니다. PCR은 현재 취입 185kg/t-p 및 3시간 30분 이전 190kg/t-p를 포함합니다.출력 (Output 인자)는 -2kg/t-p를 나타냅니다. 노열 판단인자는 용선온도입니다 (풍구 선단 RAR 6시간 이후 반영).
full_html:
도식은 풍구 선단 보정 RAR (RAR.RT) 개념을 설명합니다. 현재 장입기준 RAR (485kg/t-p)는 현재 노정장입 C.R (300) + 현재 취입 PCR (185)로 구성됩니다. 현재 풍구선단에서의 RAR (503kg/t-p)는 풍구선단 C.R (310) + 3시간 30분전 취입 PCR (190) + 보정인자 증감 (3, Input +5, Output -2)로 구성됩니다.

입력 (Input)은 Coke Ratio와 PCR로 구성됩니다. Coke Ratio는 현재 노정장입 300kg/t-p 및 풍구선단 C.R 310kg/t-p를 포함합니다. PCR은 현재 취입 185kg/t-p 및 3시간 30분 이전 190kg/t-p를 포함합니다.

출력 (Output 인자)는 -2kg/t-p를 나타냅니다. 노열 판단인자는 용선온도입니다 (풍구 선단 RAR 6시간 이후 반영).

description:
Flowchart illustrating the predicted changes in furnace conditions during PCI Cut (All Coke) operation:Inputs: Tf 상승 (Tf Increase), 감산조업 (Reduced Production), Input VB 저하 (Input VB Decrease), VBG 저하 (VBG Decrease), PC cut, Input H2 저하 (Input H2 Decrease), O/C 저하 (O/C Decrease), Coke 증후 ↑ (Coke Increase).Key process blocks and flows:
  • Tf 상승 leads to 풍구전 Coke 강도 저하 (Coke Strength Decrease in Furnace Front).
  • 감산조업 leads to Input VB 저하.
  • Input VB 저하 leads to VBG 저하.
  • VBG 저하 leads to 열류비 상승 (Increased Heat Flow Rate).
  • 열류비 상승 leads to 노정온도 저하 (Decreased Slag Temperature).
  • 열류비 상승 also leads to 풍구전 Coke 공급 불안정 (Δ L 축소) (Unstable Coke Supply in Furnace Front (Δ L Reduction)).
  • Input H2 저하 leads to Bosh gas 점성 증가 (Increased Viscosity of Bosh Gas).
  • Bosh gas 점성 증가 leads to 노하부 통기성 악화 (Worsened Gas Permeability in Lower Section).
  • 열류비 상승 also leads to 노하부 통기성 악화.
  • Input H2 저하 also leads to 중심류 발달 (Development of Center Stream).
  • 중심류 발달 leads to ηCO 저하 (Decreased ηCO).
  • O/C 저하 (Coke 증후 ↑) leads to 연화용착대 근부 불안정 (Unstable Reduction Zone Near Bottom).
  • 연화용착대 근부 불안정 leads to Cross flow 변동 대 (Large Cross Flow Variation).
  • 노하부 통기성 악화 leads to 노내 Zn 퇴적량 증가 (Increased Zn Deposition Inside Furnace).
  • 노하부 통기성 악화 also leads to 환원제비 상승 (Increased Reducing Agent Ratio).
  • 노하부 통기성 악화 also leads to 노채연와 손상 (Damage to Slag Channel).
  • 노내 Zn 퇴적량 증가 leads to 풍압변동 Slip 발생 (Fluctuation Slip Generation).
  • 풍압변동 Slip 발생 leads to 생산량 저하 (Decreased Production Quantity).
  • 풍압변동 Slip 발생 also leads to 용선품질 저하 (Decreased Slag Quality).
full_html:
Flowchart illustrating the predicted changes in furnace conditions during PCI Cut (All Coke) operation:

Inputs: Tf 상승 (Tf Increase), 감산조업 (Reduced Production), Input VB 저하 (Input VB Decrease), VBG 저하 (VBG Decrease), PC cut, Input H2 저하 (Input H2 Decrease), O/C 저하 (O/C Decrease), Coke 증후 ↑ (Coke Increase).

Key process blocks and flows:

  • Tf 상승 leads to 풍구전 Coke 강도 저하 (Coke Strength Decrease in Furnace Front).
  • 감산조업 leads to Input VB 저하.
  • Input VB 저하 leads to VBG 저하.
  • VBG 저하 leads to 열류비 상승 (Increased Heat Flow Rate).
  • 열류비 상승 leads to 노정온도 저하 (Decreased Slag Temperature).
  • 열류비 상승 also leads to 풍구전 Coke 공급 불안정 (Δ L 축소) (Unstable Coke Supply in Furnace Front (Δ L Reduction)).
  • Input H2 저하 leads to Bosh gas 점성 증가 (Increased Viscosity of Bosh Gas).
  • Bosh gas 점성 증가 leads to 노하부 통기성 악화 (Worsened Gas Permeability in Lower Section).
  • 열류비 상승 also leads to 노하부 통기성 악화.
  • Input H2 저하 also leads to 중심류 발달 (Development of Center Stream).
  • 중심류 발달 leads to ηCO 저하 (Decreased ηCO).
  • O/C 저하 (Coke 증후 ↑) leads to 연화용착대 근부 불안정 (Unstable Reduction Zone Near Bottom).
  • 연화용착대 근부 불안정 leads to Cross flow 변동 대 (Large Cross Flow Variation).
  • 노하부 통기성 악화 leads to 노내 Zn 퇴적량 증가 (Increased Zn Deposition Inside Furnace).
  • 노하부 통기성 악화 also leads to 환원제비 상승 (Increased Reducing Agent Ratio).
  • 노하부 통기성 악화 also leads to 노채연와 손상 (Damage to Slag Channel).
  • 노내 Zn 퇴적량 증가 leads to 풍압변동 Slip 발생 (Fluctuation Slip Generation).
  • 풍압변동 Slip 발생 leads to 생산량 저하 (Decreased Production Quantity).
  • 풍압변동 Slip 발생 also leads to 용선품질 저하 (Decreased Slag Quality).

description:
Flowchart illustrating the mechanism of slag movement due to inactive zones in the lower section:The inactive zone is caused by the combination of Low Slag Flow, VBG Excess, and Excess Slag Ratio, which leads to Slag Movement Speed Increase.This movement causes Slag Movement, resulting in:
  • Strong Slag Flow
  • -Slip, Drop
  • Upper K Increase
  • SP5, 6 Increase
The Slag Movement impacts the Lower Section Area and the Slag Flow Area, leading to Slag Flow Formation and Slag Flow Shape.
full_html:
Flowchart illustrating the mechanism of slag movement due to inactive zones in the lower section:

The inactive zone is caused by the combination of Low Slag Flow, VBG Excess, and Excess Slag Ratio, which leads to Slag Movement Speed Increase.

This movement causes Slag Movement, resulting in:

  • Strong Slag Flow
  • -Slip, Drop
  • Upper K Increase
  • SP5, 6 Increase

The Slag Movement impacts the Lower Section Area and the Slag Flow Area, leading to Slag Flow Formation and Slag Flow Shape.

→ 벽부개선차 Mode 조정 → Coke 외진 및 Ore 내진실시
*결과: 노체온도 저하후 Mode Action은 노체온도 상승에 영향을 미치지 않아
S.D(8/14) 실시후 Cleaning 조업 실시
→ 벽부 활성화 Action은 조기에 취해야 할 것으로 판단됨

description:
Flowchart illustrating the mechanism of coke deactivation and its impact on operation:
  1. 노심내 온도저하 (Coke temperature decrease)
  2. 통기, 흡액성 악화 (Decreased permeability and absorption capacity)
  3. 용선주변류 발달 (Development of molten slag flow around the tuyere)
  4. 노저내화물 침식 (Erosion of molten slag inside the tuyere)
  5. 고로수명 단축 (Shortened furnace life)
Feedback loop: 용선생산량 저하 (Decreased molten slag production) leads back to the flow.Final state: 뒷장 계속 (Continue to next stage).
full_html:
Flowchart illustrating the mechanism of coke deactivation and its impact on operation:

  1. 노심내 온도저하 (Coke temperature decrease)
  2. 통기, 흡액성 악화 (Decreased permeability and absorption capacity)
  3. 용선주변류 발달 (Development of molten slag flow around the tuyere)
  4. 노저내화물 침식 (Erosion of molten slag inside the tuyere)
  5. 고로수명 단축 (Shortened furnace life)

Feedback loop: 용선생산량 저하 (Decreased molten slag production) leads back to the flow.

Final state: 뒷장 계속 (Continue to next stage).

description:
Flowchart illustrating the method for high-Fe blast furnace operation:Inputs (Factors) leading to Input 산소 (Input Oxygen):
  • 풍량 ↑ (Air Volume ↑)
  • O2 부화 ↑ (O2 Enrichment ↑)
  • 풍온 ↑ (Air Temperature ↑)
  • 조습 ↓ (Moisture ↓)
  • Slag Vol ↓ (Slag Volume ↓)
Input 산소 ↑ leads to Output: 출선비 Up (Fe Content Up).Inputs (Factors) leading to 연료비 ↓ (Fuel Consumption ↓):
  • 조습 ↓ (Moisture ↓)
  • Slag Vol ↓ (Slag Volume ↓)
연료비 ↓ leads to Output: 송풍원단위 ↓ (Blower Unit ↓).송풍원단위 ↓ leads to Output: 출선비 Up (Fe Content Up).Final Step: 뒷 장 계속 (Continue to the next section).
full_html:
Flowchart illustrating the method for high-Fe blast furnace operation:

Inputs (Factors) leading to Input 산소 (Input Oxygen):

  • 풍량 ↑ (Air Volume ↑)
  • O2 부화 ↑ (O2 Enrichment ↑)
  • 풍온 ↑ (Air Temperature ↑)
  • 조습 ↓ (Moisture ↓)
  • Slag Vol ↓ (Slag Volume ↓)

Input 산소 ↑ leads to Output: 출선비 Up (Fe Content Up).

Inputs (Factors) leading to 연료비 ↓ (Fuel Consumption ↓):

  • 조습 ↓ (Moisture ↓)
  • Slag Vol ↓ (Slag Volume ↓)

연료비 ↓ leads to Output: 송풍원단위 ↓ (Blower Unit ↓).

송풍원단위 ↓ leads to Output: 출선비 Up (Fe Content Up).

Final Step: 뒷 장 계속 (Continue to the next section).
section_path: 4. 조업기준 / 4.1 고출선비 조업 방법

description:
Flowchart illustrating changes in the blast furnace interior during high blast furnace operation (고출선비 조업시 노내현상 변화).Inputs (Pellet, Scrap, HBI) lead to:
  • 과상대 (Excess charge)
  • 장입 Speed 상승 (Increased charging speed)
  • 열류비 상승 (Increased thermal load)
These factors contribute to:
  • 장입물 마찰 증대 (Increased friction of charged material)
  • 저온 열보전대 확장 (Expansion of low-temperature heat preservation zone)
  • 용착대 저하 (Decreased slagging zone)
These factors lead to:
  • 소결광 Coke 분화증대 (Increased decomposition of sintered ore Coke)
  • 통기성 악화 (Worsened permeability)
  • 노구 Gas 유속증가 (Increased gas velocity in tuyeres)
  • Coke 분화 촉진 (Promotion of coke decomposition)
  • Gas 분포 불균일 (Uneven gas distribution)
  • 노열 변동 (Fluctuation of temperature in the furnace)
The above factors result in:
  • Flooding & Channelling
  • 적정 장입물 분포 (Optimal distribution of charged material)
  • 출선재 배출 강화 (Enhanced slag discharge)
The overall impact is summarized as 산소량 증가 (Increased oxygen quantity).
full_html:
Flowchart illustrating changes in the blast furnace interior during high blast furnace operation (고출선비 조업시 노내현상 변화).

Inputs (Pellet, Scrap, HBI) lead to:

  • 과상대 (Excess charge)
  • 장입 Speed 상승 (Increased charging speed)
  • 열류비 상승 (Increased thermal load)

These factors contribute to:

  • 장입물 마찰 증대 (Increased friction of charged material)
  • 저온 열보전대 확장 (Expansion of low-temperature heat preservation zone)
  • 용착대 저하 (Decreased slagging zone)

These factors lead to:

  • 소결광 Coke 분화증대 (Increased decomposition of sintered ore Coke)
  • 통기성 악화 (Worsened permeability)
  • 노구 Gas 유속증가 (Increased gas velocity in tuyeres)
  • Coke 분화 촉진 (Promotion of coke decomposition)
  • Gas 분포 불균일 (Uneven gas distribution)
  • 노열 변동 (Fluctuation of temperature in the furnace)

The above factors result in:

  • Flooding & Channelling
  • 적정 장입물 분포 (Optimal distribution of charged material)
  • 출선재 배출 강화 (Enhanced slag discharge)

The overall impact is summarized as 산소량 증가 (Increased oxygen quantity).

description:
Flowchart illustrating the effects of increased High Output Line (출선비 ↑) operation:
  • Increased High Output Line (출선비 ↑) leads to: Increased Molten Material Production Speed (용융물 생성 Speed ↑), which leads to Increased Initial Low Line Material (출선 초기 노내 저선량 ↑). Increased Blower Pressure (송풍 압력 ↑), which leads to Increased Air Volume → Increased Air Flow Rate → Increased Initial Low Line Material (풍압 상승 → 풍압 변동폭 증가 → 공취 시기 단축 → 노내 저선량 ↑). Decreased Coke Feed Rate (Coke 입도 ↓), which leads to Reduced Low Line Material (노저 통액성 저하).
full_html:
Flowchart illustrating the effects of increased High Output Line (출선비 ↑) operation:

  • Increased High Output Line (출선비 ↑) leads to:
    • Increased Molten Material Production Speed (용융물 생성 Speed ↑), which leads to Increased Initial Low Line Material (출선 초기 노내 저선량 ↑).
    • Increased Blower Pressure (송풍 압력 ↑), which leads to Increased Air Volume → Increased Air Flow Rate → Increased Initial Low Line Material (풍압 상승 → 풍압 변동폭 증가 → 공취 시기 단축 → 노내 저선량 ↑).
    • Decreased Coke Feed Rate (Coke 입도 ↓), which leads to Reduced Low Line Material (노저 통액성 저하).

description: Flowchart illustrating the control logic for low [Si] input:Inputs (Top Row): 생산 Speed Up, 연료비 저하, 소결광 C/S 상승, 소결 MgO 상승, Tf 저하, Input SiO₂ 저하, 노정압 상승.Intermediate Calculations/States (Top Row): 열류비 상승, 용융점 상승, SiO Gas 발생량 감소.Control Actions (Middle Row): O₂ 부화 Up, 노열변동폭 감소, 용선온도 저하, 분포조정, 용착대 근부 저하.Core Process: 연화용착대 레벨저하.Intermediate State: SiO → Si 환원영역 축소.Control Actions (Bottom Row): 출선.재 강화, 저선 Level 저하, 복[Si]반응시간 감소, * 주상 탈규 강화.Final Output: 용선[Si] 저하.Final State: 뒷 장 계 속.
full_html:
Flowchart illustrating the control logic for low [Si] input:

Inputs (Top Row): 생산 Speed Up, 연료비 저하, 소결광 C/S 상승, 소결 MgO 상승, Tf 저하, Input SiO₂ 저하, 노정압 상승.

Intermediate Calculations/States (Top Row): 열류비 상승, 용융점 상승, SiO Gas 발생량 감소.

Control Actions (Middle Row): O₂ 부화 Up, 노열변동폭 감소, 용선온도 저하, 분포조정, 용착대 근부 저하.

Core Process: 연화용착대 레벨저하.

Intermediate State: SiO → Si 환원영역 축소.

Control Actions (Bottom Row): 출선.재 강화, 저선 Level 저하, 복[Si]반응시간 감소, * 주상 탈규 강화.

Final Output: 용선[Si] 저하.

Final State: 뒷 장 계 속.

description:
Flowchart illustrating the factors influencing [Si] concentration:
  • Inputs affecting Tf: 촬광석, Coke, Coal 중 맥석량, 맥석성분의 염기성, 송풍온도, 송풍습분, 산소부화, 보조연료 취입.
  • Inputs affecting Bosh Gas 중 H₂ 농도.
  • Inputs affecting O/C.
  • Inputs affecting 용융적하비: Tf, Bosh Gas 중 H₂ 농도, O/C, 송풍비, 광석용점 저하, 촬광석 환원도, 노체 방산열.
  • Inputs affecting 적하대 높이: 용융적하비, Tf, Bosh Gas 중 H₂ 농도, O/C, 송풍비, 광석용점 저하, 촬광석 환원도, 노체 방산열.
  • Inputs affecting 적하대의 Coke 온도: 용융적하비, 적하대 높이, 적하대의 용융물 보존온도, 반응의 특별 영역.
  • Inputs affecting 적하대의 용융물 보존온도: 적하대 높이, 적하대의 Coke 입자경, 용융물의 점성, 반응의 특별 영역.
  • Inputs affecting 반응의 특별 영역: 적하대의 Coke 입자경, 용융물의 점성.
All these factors ultimately influence [Si] 농도 (highlighted box).

full_html:
Three scatter plots showing the relationship between Slag Volume(%) (X-axis, 15.0 to 17.5) and quality parameters (Y-axis).

Left Plot: 강도(%) (Strength %) vs Slag Volume(%). Shows a slight positive trend.

Middle Plot: RDI(%) vs Slag Volume(%). Shows a negative trend (RDI decreases as Slag Volume increases).

Right Plot: -10mm (%) vs Slag Volume(%). Shows a positive trend (Percentage of -10mm particles increases as Slag Volume increases).

description:
Flowchart illustrating the process flow:
  • Inputs (Top Left): 노정분포 (Pipeline Distribution)
  • Inputs (Top Right): 노내영향 (Influence inside the tunnel)
  • Left Side Inputs: 반경방향 Coke 분포, 반경방향 Ore 분포, 혼합층 형성정도
  • Right Side Inputs: 용착대 형상 결정, 노내 Gas 류 분포 & 장입물강하속도 결정
  • Center: 제어수단 (Control Unit) receives inputs from Left Side and Right Side, and outputs to Left Side and Right Side.
  • Left Side Outputs: 장입모드 조정, Stock Level 조정, C.B.O.B 조정, 입도별장입기술 등
  • Right Side Outputs: 판단 (Judgment), Profile Meter, Cross Sonde, SOMA, Shaft Sonde, 노체온도, 압력분포 (Tunnel Body Temperature, Pressure Distribution)

  • Right Side Inputs: 용착대 형상 결정, 노내 Gas 류 분포 & 장입물강하속도 결정
  • Center: 제어수단 (Control Unit) receives inputs from Left Side and Right Side, and outputs to Left Side and Right Side.
  • Left Side Outputs: 장입모드 조정, Stock Level 조정, C.B.O.B 조정, 입도별장입기술 등
  • Right Side Outputs: 판단 (Judgment), Profile Meter, Cross Sonde, SOMA, Shaft Sonde, 노체온도, 압력분포 (Tunnel Body Temperature, Pressure Distribution)

description:
도표: Coke 중심장입 효과
  • 중심부 O/C 감소
  • 중심부 Gas류 강화
  • 역 V 형 융착대 형성
  • 중심부 Carbon Loss (C+O₂=CO₂) 반응 감소로 Coke 열화반응 억제
  • 노심 통기성, 흡액성 향상 → 용융물 환상류 방지
  • 대립 Coke의 노심 공급
  • 노저측벽 연와 보호

description:
Flowchart illustrating the process flow:분포변화 (Distribution Change) leads to:
- 용착대 저하 & 중심류 역제현상 (Lowering of the slag pit & reverse flow of the center stream)대책 (Countermeasure) leads to:
- 중심류 지향형 조업실시 (Center stream directed operation) (주변류 확보하) (Securing peripheral streams)These steps lead to:
수단 (Means):
- Coke 중심장입
- Nut Coke 장입Another flow starts with:
장입물 유동화 & 용착대 붕괴(터짐) (Fluidization of input material & collapse of the slag pit)This leads to:
분포제어 적정화 (역 V 형) (Optimization of distribution control (reverse V shape))
- 반경방향 O/C 균일화 (Radial O/C uniformization)
- AB 중심온도 ↓, 노구유속, 온도 ↓ (AB center temperature ↓, nozzle flow rate, temperature ↓)This leads to:
Coke Terrace 밀착관리 (Close management of Coke Terrace)
- 송풍조건 적정화(노정압 ↑) (Optimization of air supply conditions (Nozzle pressure ↑))Another flow starts with:
노체 중상부 통기성 악화 (Poor permeability in the middle-upper part of the nozzle body)This leads to:
소결광, Coke 분화 억제 (Suppression of sintering light, Coke fragmentation)
- 노내 분장입량 억제 (Suppression of internal input quantity)This leads to:
소결 RDI, 강도개선, 분율저하 (Sintering RDI, strength improvement, low rate)
- Coke 입도, 강도 증가 (Increase in Coke fineness, strength)
- Screen 관리강화, 소립비 저감 (Strengthened screen management, reduction of small particle ratio)
full_html:
Flowchart illustrating the process flow:

분포변화 (Distribution Change) leads to:
- 용착대 저하 & 중심류 역제현상 (Lowering of the slag pit & reverse flow of the center stream)

대책 (Countermeasure) leads to:
- 중심류 지향형 조업실시 (Center stream directed operation) (주변류 확보하) (Securing peripheral streams)

These steps lead to:
수단 (Means):
- Coke 중심장입
- Nut Coke 장입

Another flow starts with:
장입물 유동화 & 용착대 붕괴(터짐) (Fluidization of input material & collapse of the slag pit)

This leads to:
분포제어 적정화 (역 V 형) (Optimization of distribution control (reverse V shape))
- 반경방향 O/C 균일화 (Radial O/C uniformization)
- AB 중심온도 ↓, 노구유속, 온도 ↓ (AB center temperature ↓, nozzle flow rate, temperature ↓)

This leads to:
Coke Terrace 밀착관리 (Close management of Coke Terrace)
- 송풍조건 적정화(노정압 ↑) (Optimization of air supply conditions (Nozzle pressure ↑))

Another flow starts with:
노체 중상부 통기성 악화 (Poor permeability in the middle-upper part of the nozzle body)

This leads to:
소결광, Coke 분화 억제 (Suppression of sintering light, Coke fragmentation)
- 노내 분장입량 억제 (Suppression of internal input quantity)

This leads to:
소결 RDI, 강도개선, 분율저하 (Sintering RDI, strength improvement, low rate)
- Coke 입도, 강도 증가 (Increase in Coke fineness, strength)
- Screen 관리강화, 소립비 저감 (Strengthened screen management, reduction of small particle ratio)

description:
Flowchart illustrating the changes in internal furnace heat balance:Inputs:
  • PCR UP
  • 고온영역 상향이동 (열류비 저하)
  • Gas Volume 증가
Outputs/Results:
  • 고온영역 상향이동 (열류비 저하) leads to: 노체방산열 증가 (연화움직대 상승) 노정 Gas 온도상승 노정 Gas 현열증가 (온도 ↑, ηCO ↓)
  • Gas Volume 증가 leads to: Shaft 압손증가 노정 Gas 유속증가 노정 Dust 발생증가
All resulting factors lead to 연료비 상승 (Fuel consumption increase).
full_html:
Flowchart illustrating the changes in internal furnace heat balance:

Inputs:

  • PCR UP
  • 고온영역 상향이동 (열류비 저하)
  • Gas Volume 증가

Outputs/Results:

  • 고온영역 상향이동 (열류비 저하) leads to:
    • 노체방산열 증가 (연화움직대 상승)
    • 노정 Gas 온도상승
    • 노정 Gas 현열증가 (온도 ↑, ηCO ↓)
  • Gas Volume 증가 leads to:
    • Shaft 압손증가
    • 노정 Gas 유속증가
    • 노정 Dust 발생증가

All resulting factors lead to 연료비 상승 (Fuel consumption increase).

description:
가. Ore/coke 비 증대→ Ore 량 증대 → 노심부 하중증가 → 노심 Coke 밀도증가, Coke free space 영역 감소 → 노저부 통기· 품액성불량→ Coke 량 감소 → Slit 두께 감소 → 광석 환원성 저하에 따른 연화용착대 두께 증가 → 연화용착대 및 Shaft 부 통기불량, 압손증대, 중심약화, 주변발달 중간부 통기장애→ 중심부 노정 Gas 흐름 불안정 → 반경방향 Coke layer 두께편차증대 → Gas류 분포 불안정 (국부적 편류 발생) → 장입물 강하속도 편차발생→ Gas 흐름 불균일 주변류 증가 → 노체 열부하 증가, 노벽손상, 냉각판 파손, 장입물 강하 불안정 → 대책대책
  • 분포조정 적정화 벽부 O/C 증가 Coke 중심장입 중고 Coke 장입 C.B 저하조업
  • 연원료 성상개선 분율, 강도
뒷장 계속
full_html:
가. Ore/coke 비 증대

→ Ore 량 증대 → 노심부 하중증가 → 노심 Coke 밀도증가, Coke free space 영역 감소 → 노저부 통기· 품액성불량

→ Coke 량 감소 → Slit 두께 감소 → 광석 환원성 저하에 따른 연화용착대 두께 증가 → 연화용착대 및 Shaft 부 통기불량, 압손증대, 중심약화, 주변발달 중간부 통기장애

→ 중심부 노정 Gas 흐름 불안정 → 반경방향 Coke layer 두께편차증대 → Gas류 분포 불안정 (국부적 편류 발생) → 장입물 강하속도 편차발생

→ Gas 흐름 불균일 주변류 증가 → 노체 열부하 증가, 노벽손상, 냉각판 파손, 장입물 강하 불안정 → 대책

대책

  • 분포조정 적정화
    • 벽부 O/C 증가
    • Coke 중심장입
    • 중고 Coke 장입
    • C.B 저하조업
  • 연원료 성상개선
    • 분율, 강도

예열 온도 (°C) → 예열대
예열 Gas 확산 (CO, H2)

- CO + O₂ → CO₂
- h + O +H₂O
연소대

C의 연소반응

full_html:
고 PCI 조업 및 고 출선비 조업

고 PCI 조업 → Ore/Coke 증가, 미연 Coal 퇴적, Gas Volum 증가

고 출선비 조업 → 장입물 강하속도 증가

장입물 강하속도 증가 → 노체 연와 마모 가속

Gas Volum 증가 → 풍량증대

풍량증대 → Gas Volum 증가, 주변류 발달

미연 Coal 퇴적 → 풍액성 불량

풍액성 불량 → 주변류 발달

Ore/Coke 증가 → 장입물 분포 불균일

Gas Volum 증가 → 노체 열부하 증대

장입물 분포 불균일 → Shaft 통기성 불량

Shaft 통기성 불량 → 운착대 비대

운착대 비대 → Gas 류 불안정

노체 열부하 증대 → 냉각반 손상 가속

냉각반 마모 가속 → 냉각반 손상 가속

description:
Flowchart illustrating the relationship between blast furnace parameters and tuyere temperature reduction:풍구경 감소 (Tuyere diameter reduction) → 풍량의 감소 (Airflow reduction) → 발생 가스량의 감소 (Reduction in generated gas volume).
발생 가스량의 감소 (Reduction in generated gas volume) → 선재 공급량의 감소 (Reduction in burden supply rate).
선재 공급량의 감소 (Reduction in burden supply rate) → 공급 열량의 감소 (Reduction in supplied heat).
공급 열량의 감소 (Reduction in supplied heat) → 풍구 직하부 노저온도 저하 (Reduction in tuyere temperature below the tuyere).
full_html:
Flowchart illustrating the relationship between blast furnace parameters and tuyere temperature reduction:

풍구경 감소 (Tuyere diameter reduction) → 풍량의 감소 (Airflow reduction) → 발생 가스량의 감소 (Reduction in generated gas volume).
발생 가스량의 감소 (Reduction in generated gas volume) → 선재 공급량의 감소 (Reduction in burden supply rate).
선재 공급량의 감소 (Reduction in burden supply rate) → 공급 열량의 감소 (Reduction in supplied heat).
공급 열량의 감소 (Reduction in supplied heat) → 풍구 직하부 노저온도 저하 (Reduction in tuyere temperature below the tuyere).

description:
Flowchart illustrating the formation of TiO2 Bear coating and its protective effects:
  • Inputs: 장입 TiO2 증가 (Increased input of TiO2) and 용선 [Si] 증가 (Increased use of [Si] line) feed into 선종 [Ti] 증가 (Increased primary [Ti]).
  • 선종 [Ti] 증가 leads to 용선 점성 증가 (Increased viscosity of the use line).
  • 용선 점성 증가 leads to 노저 용선유동 감소 (Decreased flow of the use line).
  • 선종 [Ti] 증가 and Carbon 의 물리적 침식방지 (Physical erosion prevention of Carbon) feed into TiO2 Bear 에 의한 Coating 형성 (Formation of Coating by TiO2 Bear).
  • 노저 용선유동 감소 feeds into Carbon 의 물리적 침식방지.
  • TiO2 Bear 에 의한 Coating 형성 leads to 노저보호 (Protection of the use line).
  • Carbon Paste 압입 (Injection of Carbon Paste) leads to 공극의 제거 (Removal of voids).
  • 공극의 제거 leads to 냉각능력의 상승 (Increase in cooling capacity).
  • 냉각능력의 상승 leads to 냉각의 균일화 (Uniform cooling).
  • 냉각의 균일화 leads to 노저 살수량 강화 (Enhanced water consumption of the use line).
  • 노저 살수량 강화 feeds into 노저보호.
full_html:
Flowchart illustrating the formation of TiO2 Bear coating and its protective effects:

  • Inputs: 장입 TiO2 증가 (Increased input of TiO2) and 용선 [Si] 증가 (Increased use of [Si] line) feed into 선종 [Ti] 증가 (Increased primary [Ti]).
  • 선종 [Ti] 증가 leads to 용선 점성 증가 (Increased viscosity of the use line).
  • 용선 점성 증가 leads to 노저 용선유동 감소 (Decreased flow of the use line).
  • 선종 [Ti] 증가 and Carbon 의 물리적 침식방지 (Physical erosion prevention of Carbon) feed into TiO2 Bear 에 의한 Coating 형성 (Formation of Coating by TiO2 Bear).
  • 노저 용선유동 감소 feeds into Carbon 의 물리적 침식방지.
  • TiO2 Bear 에 의한 Coating 형성 leads to 노저보호 (Protection of the use line).
  • Carbon Paste 압입 (Injection of Carbon Paste) leads to 공극의 제거 (Removal of voids).
  • 공극의 제거 leads to 냉각능력의 상승 (Increase in cooling capacity).
  • 냉각능력의 상승 leads to 냉각의 균일화 (Uniform cooling).
  • 냉각의 균일화 leads to 노저 살수량 강화 (Enhanced water consumption of the use line).
  • 노저 살수량 강화 feeds into 노저보호.

description:
Flowchart illustrating the causes of Scab formation in the blast furnace hearth (Scab Generation Mechanism):
  • High SR (고로 SR 증가) leads to Increased Input Alkali (↑ Input Alkali).
  • Input Alkali (↑) leads to Increased Alkali Vapor Production (↑ Alkali Vapor 발생량 증가).
  • Increased Alkali Vapor Production (↑) leads to Increased Alkali Dust Circulation (↑ Alkali 노내 순환량 증가).
  • Alkali Dust Circulation (↑) leads to Hearth Scab Formation (노하부 Scab 생성).
  • Increased Ore Outside (Ore 외진조업) leads to Increased Ore in the Furnace (↑ 노벽부 Ore 증후).
  • Increased Ore in the Furnace (↑) leads to Slag Erosion (↑ 주변류 역제).
  • Slag Erosion (↑) leads to Increased Slag Erosion (Increased Slag Erosion).
  • Increased Slag Erosion leads to Increased Slag Erosion (Increased Slag Erosion).

Flowchart illustrating the causes of Scab formation in the blast furnace hearth (Scab Generation Mechanism):

  • High SR (고로 SR 증가) leads to Increased Input Alkali (↑ Input Alkali).
  • Input Alkali (↑) leads to Increased Alkali Vapor Production (↑ Alkali Vapor 발생량 증가).
  • Increased Alkali Vapor Production (↑) leads to Increased Alkali Dust Circulation (↑ Alkali 노내 순환량 증가).
  • Alkali Dust Circulation (↑) leads to Hearth Scab Formation (노하부 Scab 생성).
  • Increased Ore Outside (Ore 외진조업) leads to Increased Ore in the Furnace (↑ 노벽부 Ore 증후).
  • Increased Ore in the Furnace (↑) leads to Slag Erosion (↑ 주변류 역제).
  • Slag Erosion (↑) leads to Increased Slag Erosion (Increased Slag Erosion).

description: Figure showing Zn input (Stave 교체 to 정수, Zn 입력 0.3kg/t-p 이상 장기간 유지) and Zn input amount (Zn 입력) over time (5/15 to 7/10).Graphs showing slag flow (풍량) and Zn concentration (Zn 0도, Zn 90도, Zn 180도, Zn 270도) for S10, S9, S8, and S7 furnaces, all indicating no formation of furnace scale (노체 부착물 형성 조짐 없음) after the Zn input increase.
full_html:
Figure showing Zn input (Stave 교체 to 정수, Zn 입력 0.3kg/t-p 이상 장기간 유지) and Zn input amount (Zn 입력) over time (5/15 to 7/10).

Graphs showing slag flow (풍량) and Zn concentration (Zn 0도, Zn 90도, Zn 180도, Zn 270도) for S10, S9, S8, and S7 furnaces, all indicating no formation of furnace scale (노체 부착물 형성 조짐 없음) after the Zn input increase.
section_path: 6 기술이론 / 6.4 고로하부 Scab 생성기구 및 대책 / 6.4.1 Scab 생성기구

description: Graph showing Zn input (Zn 입량) and furnace temperature trends from July 15 to October 7, 2016, for 4 High Furnaces.The top chart shows Zn input (Zn 입량) increasing significantly starting around August 5 (marked by a red arrow), coinciding with a period of high Zn input (정수).The subsequent charts show furnace temperatures (Furnace Temp) for various locations (S11, S10, S9, S8, S7) and conditions (0도, 90도, 180도, 270도). Vertical lines mark the period of high Zn input (July 22 to August 2) and the shutdown/restart period (August 30 to September 2).Annotations indicate that temperatures in S10 and S9 locations dropped significantly starting around August 5, suggesting the formation of slag (부착물 형성 판단).
full_html:
Graph showing Zn input (Zn 입량) and furnace temperature trends from July 15 to October 7, 2016, for 4 High Furnaces.

The top chart shows Zn input (Zn 입량) increasing significantly starting around August 5 (marked by a red arrow), coinciding with a period of high Zn input (정수).

The subsequent charts show furnace temperatures (Furnace Temp) for various locations (S11, S10, S9, S8, S7) and conditions (0도, 90도, 180도, 270도). Vertical lines mark the period of high Zn input (July 22 to August 2) and the shutdown/restart period (August 30 to September 2).

Annotations indicate that temperatures in S10 and S9 locations dropped significantly starting around August 5, suggesting the formation of slag (부착물 형성 판단).

description: Graphs illustrating wind distribution and operational data (P3R3 actual results) over time (H+0 to H+18).The graphs are categorized by BV (Nm³/min), Master Micro (m), and CO/CO2 (Cross over).The legend indicates data series for BV: 포3 3차분리, 공기(16.12강척), 계척, 실척.The legend indicates data series for Master Micro: 포3 헬리고제, 공기(16.12강척), 계척, 실척.The legend indicates data series for CO/CO2: 실척(CO), 수동(CO), 실척(CO₂), 수동(CO₂).Annotations on the Master Micro graph include: 4->2번, Mater #2 수치, #4 정상화, 7번 미리작업->3번, 7번 3번, 4번 닫음, and 교정작업.Legend for CO/CO2 graph: 실척(CO), 수동(CO), 실척(CO₂), 수동(CO₂).Text below the graphs: 뒷 장 계속.
full_html:
Graphs illustrating wind distribution and operational data (P3R3 actual results) over time (H+0 to H+18).

The graphs are categorized by BV (Nm³/min), Master Micro (m), and CO/CO2 (Cross over).

The legend indicates data series for BV: 포3 3차분리, 공기(16.12강척), 계척, 실척.

The legend indicates data series for Master Micro: 포3 헬리고제, 공기(16.12강척), 계척, 실척.

The legend indicates data series for CO/CO2: 실척(CO), 수동(CO), 실척(CO₂), 수동(CO₂).

Annotations on the Master Micro graph include: 4->2번, Mater #2 수치, #4 정상화, 7번 미리작업->3번, 7번 3번, 4번 닫음, and 교정작업.

Legend for CO/CO2 graph: 실척(CO), 수동(CO), 실척(CO₂), 수동(CO₂).

Text below the graphs: 뒷 장 계속.

description:
Flowchart illustrating the drilling and oxygen lance process:
  1. Start: Core Drill Bit 이용 (GL 7300→7900)
  2. Condition: Carbon Drilling 깊이: 1300~2000mm
  3. Decision Point 1: 완료기준: 400 ~ 500°C (Core Drill 불가)
    • If No (Not met): Loop back to Core Drill Bit 이용.
    • If Yes (Met): Proceed to next step.
  4. Proceed to: 일발 Drill Bit 이용 (GL 7300→7900)
  5. Condition: 부착총 Drilling 깊이: 500 ~ 1000mm
  6. Decision Point 2: 완료기준: 800°C
    • If Yes (Met): Proceed to next step.
    • If No (Not met): Loop back to 일발 Drill Bit 이용.
  7. Proceed to: O₂ Lancing 실시 (GL 7300→7900)
  8. Decision Point 3: 출선 성공
    • If No (Not successful): Loop back to O₂ Lancing 실시.
    • If Yes (Successful): End.
full_html:
Flowchart illustrating the drilling and oxygen lance process:

  1. Start: Core Drill Bit 이용 (GL 7300→7900)
  2. Condition: Carbon Drilling 깊이: 1300~2000mm
  3. Decision Point 1: 완료기준: 400 ~ 500°C (Core Drill 불가)
    • If No (Not met): Loop back to Core Drill Bit 이용.
    • If Yes (Met): Proceed to next step.
  4. Proceed to: 일발 Drill Bit 이용 (GL 7300→7900)
  5. Condition: 부착총 Drilling 깊이: 500 ~ 1000mm
  6. Decision Point 2: 완료기준: 800°C
    • If Yes (Met): Proceed to next step.
    • If No (Not met): Loop back to 일발 Drill Bit 이용.
  7. Proceed to: O₂ Lancing 실시 (GL 7300→7900)
  8. Decision Point 3: 출선 성공
    • If No (Not successful): Loop back to O₂ Lancing 실시.
    • If Yes (Successful): End.

description: Graph showing the water cooling schedule (주수 냉각계획). The Y-axis represents Water Cooling Rate (주수 냉각 속도) in m³/min, ranging from 0 to 6. The X-axis represents Time (주수 냉각 시간), divided into stages by arrows indicating Water Level Adjustment Rate (수위조절냉각) and Water Discharge Rate (배수종료). The graph illustrates a stepwise increase in cooling rate followed by a constant rate, reaching a steady state labeled '저유 Level 수위조정' (Low Level Water Level Adjustment). Key points marked are Water Inlet Time (주수개시), Water Level Adjustment Rate (수위조절냉각), Water Discharge Start Time (배수개시), and Water Discharge End Time (배수종료).

description:
Flowchart illustrating the determination of the drying pressure setting:Inputs: 건조열풍 균일화로 (Drying thermal wind uniformization), 노내에서의 편류방지 (Prevention of drift inside the furnace), 증발수분의 연와내부 재침투 및 目地部 Crack 조장 (Re-entry and crack formation of evaporated moisture inside the furnace).The process branches into two main paths:
  1. Path leading to 目地部 Crack 발생증가 억제 (Suppression of increase in 目地部 Crack formation): This path is associated with 노정압 하향시 (Reducing drying pressure).
  2. Path leading to 적정 노정압 설정 (Setting appropriate drying pressure): This path is associated with 노정압 상향시 (Increasing drying pressure).
The output of the appropriate drying pressure setting leads to 뒷 장 계 속 (Continuation to the next section).
full_html:
Flowchart illustrating the determination of the drying pressure setting:

Inputs: 건조열풍 균일화로 (Drying thermal wind uniformization), 노내에서의 편류방지 (Prevention of drift inside the furnace), 증발수분의 연와내부 재침투 및 目地部 Crack 조장 (Re-entry and crack formation of evaporated moisture inside the furnace).

The process branches into two main paths:

  1. Path leading to 目地部 Crack 발생증가 억제 (Suppression of increase in 目地部 Crack formation): This path is associated with 노정압 하향시 (Reducing drying pressure).
  2. Path leading to 적정 노정압 설정 (Setting appropriate drying pressure): This path is associated with 노정압 상향시 (Increasing drying pressure).

The output of the appropriate drying pressure setting leads to 뒷 장 계 속 (Continuation to the next section).

description: Flowchart detailing the observation procedure:1. 노정 Hopper 원료장입 (Input of raw material into the Hopper)2. 장입 30%시 장입 BC stop (Stop BC at 30% input)3. 노내진입, 측정봉 설치 (Enter the Hopper, set up measuring rod)4. 장입 BC start (Start BC)5. 장입 40%시 장입 BC stop (Stop BC at 40% input)6. 노내진입, 측정 및 측정봉 재설치 (Enter the Hopper, reposition measuring rod)7. 장입 BC start (Start BC)8. 장입 60%시 장입 BC stop (Stop BC at 60% input)9. 노내진입, 측정 및 측정봉 재설치 (Enter the Hopper, reposition measuring rod)10. 장입 BC start (Start BC)11. 장입 80%시 장입 BC (Input 80% of BC)12. 노내진입, 측정 및 측정봉 철거 (Enter the Hopper, remove measuring rod)13. 장입 완료 (Input complete)14. 노내진입, 측정 및 측정봉 철거 (Enter the Hopper, remove measuring rod)
full_html:
Flowchart detailing the observation procedure:

1. 노정 Hopper 원료장입 (Input of raw material into the Hopper)

2. 장입 30%시 장입 BC stop (Stop BC at 30% input)

3. 노내진입, 측정봉 설치 (Enter the Hopper, set up measuring rod)

4. 장입 BC start (Start BC)

5. 장입 40%시 장입 BC stop (Stop BC at 40% input)

6. 노내진입, 측정 및 측정봉 재설치 (Enter the Hopper, reposition measuring rod)

7. 장입 BC start (Start BC)

8. 장입 60%시 장입 BC stop (Stop BC at 60% input)

9. 노내진입, 측정 및 측정봉 재설치 (Enter the Hopper, reposition measuring rod)

10. 장입 BC start (Start BC)

11. 장입 80%시 장입 BC (Input 80% of BC)

12. 노내진입, 측정 및 측정봉 철거 (Enter the Hopper, remove measuring rod)

13. 장입 완료 (Input complete)

14. 노내진입, 측정 및 측정봉 철거 (Enter the Hopper, remove measuring rod)

full_html:
Diagram illustrating the observation location and orientation.

The diagram shows a view of the Hopper (노정 Hopper 측면도) and a diagram of the Hopper (노정 Hopper 투시도) with a coordinate system.

The coordinate system is centered at 0', with axes marked 90', 180', and 270'.

A table labeled "막대봉" (Measuring rod) is placed next to the Hopper view, and a 3m(L)-백색 Taping (3m long white tape) is shown.
